content: st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k4 mb k3 p10 k3 mb k4 * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 28 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x *k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 29 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k8 * 6x p10 k p 2x k row 30-34 - repeat row 28 & 29 row 35 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place forward k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 36 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x * k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 37 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k8* 6x p10 k p 2x k row 38- 42 repeat for row 36 & 37 row 43 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place forward k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 44 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x * k10 p2 k4 p2 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 45 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k2 p4 k2 * 6x p10 k p 2x k row 46 - 52 - repeat row 44 & 45 row 53 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x p120 k p 2x k row 54 - slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x k120 p k 2x p repeat row 53 & 54 to the approximate size of the blanket length you want less the bunny pattern row 100 is just given as a number to start the reverse pattern with and is by no means an indicator of the length you should be at in the above photo i added two more bunnies and lessened the number of repeat row in the middle of the blanket so the bunnies were along the side rather than the top and bottom starting on the wrong side row 100 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x * k10 p2 k4 p2 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 101 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k2 p4 k2 * 6x p10 k p 2x k row 102- 108 repeat row 100 & 101 row 109 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place
